name: Hide Firefox Tab Bar on OS X (sorta)
description:
Hides the tabs/title bar - the part that has the tabs and close/minimize/fullscreen buttons - in Firefox. 

Tested only on OS X, might work on Windows and/or GNU/Linux.
additional_info:
For use with Pentadactyl/vimperator or for those who know FF's keyboard shortcuts.

Doesn't fully hide the title bar and the close/minimize/fullscreen buttons are awkwardly overlaid over webpages. As you can see in the screen shot - the grey circles are the buttons, (and the blue bar at the bottom is http://5digits.org/pentadactyl/ ).
